main.name: Deepak Bhavsar
main.description: A Developer by Day and Tutor by Night
main.bio: I am an engineer with an entrepreneurial spirit and a passion for coding. I pursued my first development internship to kick off my career as a WordPress and Android developer by Getspace. Then I got an opportunity to work as a Machine Learning Intern in 1Rivet. Now, I am working as a Blochchain Developer.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details, get coached or anything else.

resume.skillmessage: I am always interested in playing around with new technologies  but these are the ones that have really won me over

education.description: Here I took my Bachelor of Computer Engineering, It was here that I discovered my passion for Machine Learning and Data Science and found that I have a knack for understanding complex algorithms.

Here I took my Diploma in Computer Engineering and achieved a much more thorough education in the underlying theory, concepts. Here I developed my skill in programming languages like C and Java and also got some hands-on experience in computer maintenance while helping the computer technicians.

work.title: Solidity Developer
work.description: As a solodity developer I create smart contract as per business requirement for ethereum, binance, tron and polygon blockchain.

work.title: Blockchain Developer
work.description: I explored and learned about blockchain here. Learned core blockchain concepts, bitcoin blockchain, ethereum blockchain and solidity.

work.title: Machine Learning Intern
work.description: Learned Agile Methodology, Design Patterns, automation using python, ML Libraries and Algorithms and Completed project Sentiment Analysis.

work.title: WordPress and Android Development Intern.
work.description: Learned website development in WordPress using plugins WooCommerce, WPBakery. Developed an Android app for websites using WebView and integrating AdMob.

work.title: Station Manager.
work.description: As a station manager in Grofers by daily responsibility was directing, optimizing and coordinating full order cycle and goal setting, workflow, staffing,  and keep track of quality, delivery times and transport costs.

skills.name: Blockchain
skills.description: A blockchain is essentially a digital ledger of transactions that is duplicated and distributed across the entire network of computer systems on the blockchain.

skills.name: Git
skills.description: I use Git for all of my projects so far. I have used Git for version control in small teams and have toyed around with contributing to Open Source Projects.

skills.name: Python
skills.description: A interpreted High-Level Language. Used python to build and train machine learning models.

skills.name: Heroku
skills.description: I use Heroku as my hosting platform for most of my projects because so far they are all unpaid and their free tier is convenient. I also appreciate its integration with Github for such simple deployment.

projects.title: Blockchain based twitter like webapp prototype
SENTIMENT ANALYSIS
projects.category: Machine Learning(Python, keras, NLP, streamlit, NumPy)

projects.title: Instagram Scrapper and Object Detection
projects.category: Python Automation and Computer Vision (YOLO, Python)

testimonials.text: Deepak's enthusiasm for the profession is seen. He worked well and has shown initiative when seeking out new skills and learning opportunities.
